description: The newly appointed goddesses Eir and Saga accept their first job for the Goddess Assistance Agency, but it already turns out to be a conundrum for the young maidens. They enlist the help from their role model Belldandy to help them with the wish of a male high schooler. Belldandy together with Keiichi try their best to fulfill his wish, but their plans just don`t seem to work out. But when they start a band together with the help of Urd and Skuld, maybe things will work out for the best afterall.
